1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the object in the frame.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the object in the frame.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible but positioned towards the bottom of the image. Moving up will help center the object vertically, making it easier to approach.

4.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the object in the frame.

5.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

6.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth detail. There are no obstacles blocking the view.
